label: Postgres example flows

name: ui-table handler
info:
# ui-table handler
Universal handler for ui-table.
## features
- buffer table data
- add or update individual rows or cells of the table
- delete rows
- clear tableData
- handle column width
- handle column order
- hide und unhide columns
- hide and unhide rows
- records row order
- support for nested columns [(column groups)](http://tabulator.info/examples/4.7#column-groups)
- support for child rows (_children) [(nested data trees)](http://tabulator.info/examples/4.7#tree)

For real life example see:

**syslog server** for logfile like table with filters

**remote device table** for dynamically updated table with context menues

**irrigation system** for sortable rows

## sending data to ui-tabel

- sending an `array` as discribed in ui-table will replace the complete table and delete all table edits
  
  if `msg.keepEdits=true` is added the existing edits will be kept.
- send an `object` containing the updated properties of a table row by sending msg.<tableDataProp>.

  The table is updated using the `updateOrAddData` command. You can alter the command used by adding the `msg.tabulatorCommand` and `msg.tabulatorParameter`

```
msg.tabulatorCommand="addData";
msg.tabulatorParameter=[true];
```
## configuration
- `tabulator` json formatted object containing configuration of the table. See ui-table for more details.
- `property` property of the msg object that contains the data to be passed to ui-table. I.e. *state* `msg.state`
- `index` index column to identify individual rows. Each message containing data must have a unique `msg.topic` to identify the row. Messages without this `msg.topic` will be droped. It is not nessesary but possible to display the index column in the table. Do not enable editing on this column otherwise you will loose the connection and another row will be added to the table as soon as a new message arrives!

   Defaults to *$topic* `msg.state.$topic`
- `maxRows`maximum number of rows held by table widget. If grater than **0** the amount of rows in ui-table is limited. For this to work the index row must be a Number. ´rows < currentID-maxRows´ will be deleted.
- `maxStore`maximum number of rows stored by this node for replay if a client connects. If grater than **0** the amount of rows in flow context is limited. for this to work the index row must be a Number. ´rows < currentID-maxStore´ will be deleted.
- `dashboard` name of the dashboard tab to only update the table if the dashboard is visible. If empty the table will be updated on every tab change and connect.
- `context` configuration of context data. The subflow will save or cache data in the flows context using `$parent.`. 
   **tableData** caches the incoming data to restore it on `ui-control´ *change* messages.
   **tableConfig** saves column width and order to save the interactive table layot
   **tableEdit** saves edits on the table data otherwise it would be overwritten when new data arrives
```json
{
    "tableData": {
        "name": "tableData"
    },
    "tableConfig": {
        "name": "tableConfig",
        "storage": "file"
    },
    "tableEdit": {
        "name": "tableEdit",
        "storage": "file"
    }
}
```

## commands
commands can be passed by sending a object as `msg.payload`

```json
{
    "command": "delete",
    "object": "columnOrder"
}
```

- `deleteTable` tableCache
- `deleteRow` delete single row. `object` matching index property
- `ignoreRow` delete single row and put it on an ignore list. `object` matching index property
- `unIgnoreRow`remove row from the ignore list.  `object` matching index property
- `unIgnoreRows`delte the ignore list. 
- `deleteRowOrder` delete custom row order
- `deleteColumnOrder` delete custom column order
  This is important if you add or delete columns in the tabulator config otherwise the columns most likely don`t show up
- `deleteColumnWidth` delete custom column width
- `columnHide` hide a column. `object` matching column field
- `columnUnHide` unhide a column. `object` matching column field
- `columnsUnHide` unhide all hidden columns.
- `setMaxStore` set maximum amount of rows in cache
- `setMaxDisplay` set maximum amout of rows in ui-table
- `getTable` get table data (as displayed) as an array (on 2nd output)
 
## background
ui-table warps the powerfull tabluator library.  This subflow makes it easier to unleash the powerfull features of ui-table

env.name: tabulator
env.value: {"tabulator":{"responsiveLayout":"collapse","responsiveLayoutCollapseStartOpen":false,"index":"$name","layout":"fitColumns","movableColumns":true,"groupBy":"","columnResized":"function(column){ var newColumn = { field: column._column.field, visible: column._column.visible, width: column._column.width, widthFixed: column._column.widthFixed, widthStyled: column._column.widthStyled }; this.send({topic:this.config.topic,ui_control:{callback:'columnResized',columnWidths:newColumn}}); }","columnMoved":"function(column, columns){ var newColumns=[]; columns.forEach(function (column) { newColumns.push({'field': column._column.definition.field, 'title': column._column.definition.title}); }); this.send({topic:this.config.topic,ui_control:{callback:'columnMoved',columns:newColumns}}); }","rowFormatter":"function(row){ var data = row.getData(); switch (data.$state) { case \"lost\": row.getElement().style.backgroundColor = \"#9e2e66\"; row.getElement().style.color = \"#a6a6a6\"; break; case \"sleeping\": row.getElement().style.backgroundColor = \"#336699\"; break; case \"disconnected\": row.getElement().style.backgroundColor = \"#cc3300\"; row.getElement().style.color = \"#a6a6a6\"; break; case \"alert\": row.getElement().style.backgroundColor = \"#A6A6DF\"; break; case \"init\": row.getElement().style.backgroundColor = \"#f2f20d\"; break; case \"ready\": row.getElement().style.backgroundColor = \"\"; row.getElement().style.color = \"\"; break; } }","columns":[{"formatter":"responsiveCollapse","width":30,"minWidth":30,"align":"center","resizable":false,"headerSort":false,"frozen":true,"title":"expand","field":"expand","headerVertical":"flip"},{"formatter":"function(cell, formatterParams, onRendered) { var html = cell.getValue(); return html; }","title":"State","field":"$stateIcon","width":100,"frozen":true,"headerVertical":"flip"},{"formatter":"function(cell, formatterParams, onRendered) { var html = cell.getValue(); return html; }","title":"Signal","field":"signalIcon","width":100,"frozen":true,"headerVertical":"flip"},{"title":"Name","field":"$name","width":100,"frozen":true,"headerVertical":"flip"},{"title":"State","field":"$state","width":100,"align":"center","headerVertical":"flip"},{"title":"last-ready","field":"lastSeenreadyFormatted","width":100,"align":"left","headerVertical":"flip"},{"title":"Homie","field":"$homie","width":100,"align":"left","headerVertical":"flip"},{"title":"Platform","field":"$implementation","width":100,"align":"left","headerVertical":"flip"},{"title":"Statistics","columns":[{"title":"Interval","field":"interval","width":100,"headerVertical":"flip"},{"formatterParams":{"outputFormat":"d hh:mm:ss","inputFormat":"seconds","invalidPlaceholder":"(unknown)"},"title":"Uptime","field":"uptime","formatter":"function(cell, formatterParams, onRendered){ var pad = function (num) { return (\"0\"+num).slice(-2); }; var secs = Number(cell.getValue()); if (Number.isNaN(secs)) return; var minutes = Math.floor(secs / 60); secs = secs%60; var hours = Math.floor(minutes/60); minutes = minutes%60; var days = Math.floor(hours/24); hours = hours%24; if (days>0) return days+\"d \"+pad(hours)+\":\"+pad(minutes); else return pad(hours)+\":\"+pad(minutes)+\":\"+pad(secs); }","width":100,"headerVertical":"flip"},{"formatterParams":{"min":0,"max":100,"color":["red","orange","green"],"legend":"function (value) {if (value>0) return \"\"+value+\" %\"; else return; }","legendColor":"#FFFFFF","legendAlign":"center"},"title":"Signal","field":"signal","formatter":"progress","width":100,"headerVertical":"flip"},{"formatterParams":{"min":2.5,"max":3.5,"color":["red","green","red"],"legend":"function (value) { if (value>0) return \"\"+value+\" V\"; else return; }","legendColor":"#101010","legendAlign":"center"},"title":"Supply","field":"supply","formatter":"progress","width":100,"headerVertical":"flip"},{"formatterParams":{"min":0,"max":100,"color":["red","orange","green"],"legend":"function (value) { if (value>0) return \"\"+value+\" %\"; else return; }","legendColor":"#101010","legendAlign":"center"},"title":"Battery","field":"battery","formatter":"progress","width":100,"headerVertical":"flip"},{"formatterParams":{"min":0,"max":100000,"color":["red","orange","green"],"legend":"function (value) { if (value>0) return \"\"+(value/1024).toFixed(2)+\" kB\"; else return; }","legendColor":"#101010","legendAlign":"center"},"title":"Memory","field":"freeheap","formatter":"progress","width":100,"headerVertical":"flip"},{"formatterParams":{"target":"_blank","min":0,"max":100,"color":["red","orange","green"],"legend":"function (value) { if (value>0) return \"\"+value+\" %\"; else return; }","legendColor":"#101010","legendAlign":"center"},"title":"CPU load","field":"cpuload","formatter":"progress","width":100,"headerVertical":"flip"},{"formatterParams":{"min":20,"max":60,"color":["green","orange","red"],"legend":"function (value) { if (value>0) return \"\"+value+\" °C\"; else return; }","legendColor":"#101010","legendAlign":"center"},"title":"CPU temp","field":"cputemp","formatter":"progress","width":100,"headerVertical":"flip"}]},{"title":"Firmware","columns":[{"formatter":"link","formatterParams":{"labelField":"$localip","urlPrefix":"http://","target":"_blank"},"title":"IP","field":"$localip","width":100},{"title":"mac","field":"$mac","width":100},{"title":"Accsess Point","field":"SSID","width":100},{"title":"Firmware","field":"name","width":100},{"title":"Version","field":"version","width":100},{"title":"Last Boot Cause","field":"lastBootCause","width":100},{"title":"Reset Reason","field":"resetReason","width":100}]}]},"customHeight":12}

name: Embed Grafana dashboard in Dashboard UI
Reset
info:
This flow clears any contents from
the `mytable` table and inserts a single
record:

    id   message
    1    'hello world'

name: prepare
Demo
info:
This flow demonstrates:

* transactions and auto-commit queries
* positional arguments (i.e. $argName)
* query output from multiple queries

name: prepare
Rollback
info:
If you start a transaction and don't commit it,
your changes will not be saved.

name: prepare
check

template:
echo '\x \\ DROP DATABASE IF EXISTS {{payload}};' | psql -U postgres -h localhost

echo '\x \\ CREATE DATABASE {{payload}};' | psql -U postgres -h localhost
echo '\x \\ CREATE EXTENSION IF NOT EXISTS timescaledb CASCADE;' | psql -U postgres -h localhost

name: stockdb@localhost
query:
DROP TABLE IF EXISTS {{ msg.topic }} CASCADE;

CREATE TABLE {{ msg.topic }}
(
    time TIMESTAMPTZ NOT NULL,
    company text COLLATE pg_catalog."default" NOT NULL,
    datum date NOT NULL,
    open numeric,
    high numeric,
    low numeric,
    close numeric,
    volume numeric,
    adjclose numeric,
    dividend numeric,
    split numeric,
    CONSTRAINT stock_pkey PRIMARY KEY (company, datum)
)
WITH (
    OIDS = FALSE
)
TABLESPACE pg_default;

name: Create hypertable
template: echo '\x \\ SELECT create_hypertable('{{ msg.topic }}', 'time');' | psql -U postgres -h localhost -d stockdb

name: stockdb@localhost
query: SELECT * FROM stocks;

name: stockdb@localhost
query:
INSERT INTO stocks (time, company, datum, open, high, low, close, adjclose, volume, dividend, split) VALUES
('{{msg.payload.timestamp}}', '{{msg.topic}}', '{{msg.payload.timestamp}}', '{{msg.payload.open}}', '{{msg.payload.high}}', '{{msg.payload.low}}', '{{msg.payload.close}}', '{{msg.payload.adjusted_close}}', '{{msg.payload.volume}}', '{{msg.payload.dividend_amount}}','{{msg.payload.split_coefficient}}')
ON CONFLICT (company, datum) 
DO NOTHING;

template:
echo '\x \\ DROP DATABASE IF EXISTS {{payload}};' | psql -U postgres -h localhost

echo '\x \\ CREATE DATABASE {{payload}};' | psql -U postgres -h localhost
echo '\x \\ CREATE EXTENSION IF NOT EXISTS timescaledb CASCADE;' | psql -U postgres -h localhost -d sensor_data

name: sensor_data@localhost
query:
DROP TABLE IF EXISTS "{{ msg.topic }}" CASCADE;

CREATE TABLE "{{ msg.topic }}" (
	"ts" timestamptz NOT NULL,
	"masterid" varchar[50] NOT NULL,
	"sensorid" integer NOT NULL,
	"cap" integer NOT NULL,
	"accel" integer NOT NULL,
	"surftemp" integer NOT NULL,
	"inttemp" integer NOT NULL,
	"exttemp" integer NOT NULL,
	"mvbat" integer NOT NULL,
	"mvnoise" integer,
	"vhigh" integer,
    "vlow" integer,
    "rcharge" integer,
    "mwindow" integer,
    "mperiod" integer,
    "sequence" integer,
    "average" integer,
    "stdev" float,
    "z" float,
	CONSTRAINT "sensor_data_table_pk" PRIMARY KEY ("ts")
) WITH (
  OIDS=FALSE
)
TABLESPACE pg_default;

name: Create hypertable
template: echo '\x \\ SELECT create_hypertable('sensorid', 'ts');' | psql -U postgres -h localhost -d sensor_data

name: Receive data from Masters & write to Timeseries database
sensor_data@localhost
query:
INSERT INTO sensor_data_table 
(
    ts, 
    masterid,
    sensorid, 
    cap, 
    accel, 
    surftemp,
    inttemp, 
    exttemp, 
    mvbat, 
    mvnoise,
    vhigh,
    vlow,
    rcharge,
    mwindow,
    mperiod,
    sequence,
    average,
    stdev,
    z
) VALUES
(
    '{{msg.timestamp}}', 
    '{{{msg.masterid}}}',
    '{{msg.sensorid}}', 
    '{{msg.cap}}', 
    '{{msg.accel}}', 
    '{{msg.surftemp}}', 
    '{{msg.inttemp}}', 
    '{{msg.exttemp}}', 
    '{{msg.mvbat}}',
    '{{msg.mvnoise}}',
    '{{msg.vhigh}}',
    '{{msg.vlow}}',
    '{{msg.rcharge}}',
    '{{msg.mwindow}}',
    '{{msg.period}}',
    '{{msg.sequence}}',
    '{{msg.avg}}',
    '{{msg.stdev}}',
    '{{msg.z}}'
);

--SELECT 
--    pg_terminate_backend(pid) 
--FROM 
--    pg_stat_activity 
--WHERE 
    -- don't kill my own connection!
--    pid <> pg_backend_pid();

name: extensions
template:
echo '\x \\ DROP DATABASE IF EXISTS {{msg.topic}};' | psql -U postgres -h localhost

echo '\x \\ CREATE DATABASE {{msg.topic}};' | psql -U postgres -h localhost
echo '\x \\ CREATE EXTENSION IF NOT EXISTS timescaledb CASCADE;' | psql -U postgres -h localhost -d weather_data
echo '\x \\ CREATE EXTENSION IF NOT EXISTS postgis CASCADE;' | psql -U postgres -h localhost -d weather_data

name: weather_data@localhost
query:
DROP TABLE IF EXISTS "{{ msg.topic }}" CASCADE;

-- lon/lat for geography (better than geometry for worldwide 
-- ST_Distance(geometry, geometry)
-- ST_GeographyFromText(text)
-- ST_Transform(geometry, srid)
-- ST_X(point)
-- POINT(lon lat)
CREATE TABLE "{{ msg.topic }}"  (
	"weatherts" TIMESTAMPTZ DEFAULT Now(),
--	"geom" geography(POINT),
--	"geom" geography (LINESTRING),
	"geom" geography (POLYGON),
	"latitude" numeric,
	"longitude" numeric,
	"local_time" varchar(50),
	"day_night" char,
	"timezone" varchar(50),
	"timezone_offset" integer,
	"customer" integer,
	"weather_id" integer,
	"weather_main" varchar(50),
	"weather_description" varchar(50),
	"weather_icon" varchar(5),
	-- sunrise and sunset in EPOCH/1000
	"dt" bigint,
	"sunrise" bigint,
	"sunset" bigint,
	"temp" numeric,
	"feelslike" numeric,
	"pressure" numeric,
	"humidity" numeric,
	"dewpoint" numeric,
	"uvindex" numeric,
	"clouds" numeric,
	"visibility" numeric,
	"windspeed" numeric,
	"winddirection" numeric,
	"windgust" numeric,
	"rain_1h" numeric,
	"snow_1h" numeric,
	"hourly_1_rain" numeric,
	"hourly_1_snow" numeric,
	"basestation" varchar(50),
	CONSTRAINT "weather_data_table_pk" PRIMARY KEY ("weatherts")
) WITH (
  OIDS=FALSE
)
TABLESPACE pg_default;

-- SELECT create_hypertable ("geom", "weatherts"); Does not work !!

name: Create hypertable
template:
// 
echo '\x \\ SELECT create_hypertable('geom', 'weatherts');' | psql -U postgres -h localhost -d weather_data

name: weather_data@localhost
query:
-- timestamp inserted automatically with default value now()


INSERT INTO weather_data_table 
(
 geom
, latitude, longitude 
--,local_time
, day_night
, timezone, timezone_offset, customer 
, weather_id, weather_main, weather_description, weather_icon 
, dt, sunrise, sunset
, temp, feelslike 
, pressure, humidity, dewpoint, uvindex 
, clouds, visibility, windspeed
, winddirection, windgust, rain_1h, snow_1h 
, hourly_1_rain, hourly_1_snow, basestation
) 
    VALUES
(
ST_GeomFromText('POLYGON((4.29463 50.79058, 4.29928 50.79637, 4.30460 50.79602, 4.30422 50.78985, 4.29334 50.78454, 4.29463 50.79058))',4326)
-- ST_GeomFromText('LINESTRING(4.29463 50.79058, 4.29928 50.79637, 4.30460 50.79602, 4.30422 50.78985, 4.29463 50.79058)',4326)
-- ST_GeomFromText('POINT(4.3391 50.9427)',4326)
,'{{msg.payload.lat}}','{{msg.payload.lon}}'
--,'{{msg.local_time}}'
, '{{msg.day_night}}'
,'{{msg.payload.timezone}}','{{msg.payload.timezone_offset}}', '{{msg.topic}}' 
,'{{msg.payload.current.weather.0.id}}','{{msg.payload.current.weather.0.main}}', '{{msg.payload.current.weather.0.description}}', '{{msg.payload.current.weather.0.icon}}'
,'{{msg.dt}}', '{{msg.sunrise}}', '{{msg.sunset}}'
,'{{msg.payload.current.temp}}', '{{msg.payload.current.feels_like}}'
,'{{msg.payload.current.pressure}}', '{{msg.payload.current.humidity}}', '{{msg.payload.current.dew_point}}', '{{msg.payload.current.uvi}}'
,'{{msg.payload.current.clouds}}', '{{msg.payload.current.visibility}}', '{{msg.payload.current.wind_speed}}' 
,'{{msg.payload.current.wind_deg}}', '{{msg.payload.current.wind_speed}}', '{{msg.payload.current.rain}}', '{{msg.payload.current.snow}}'
,'{{msg.payload.hourly_rain}}', '{{msg.payload.hourly_snow}}','testbase'
);
--ON CONFLICT (customer, weatherts) 
--DO NOTHING;        

-- close other idle connections
--SELECT 
--    pg_terminate_backend(pid) 
--FROM 
--    pg_stat_activity 
--WHERE 
    -- don't kill my own connection!
--    pid <> pg_backend_pid();

name: customer_config@localhost
query:
DROP TABLE IF EXISTS "{{ msg.topic }}" CASCADE;

CREATE TABLE "{{ msg.topic }}" (
	"customerID" serial NOT NULL,
	"cust_geom" geography (POLYGON),
	"timezone" varchar(50),
	"description" varchar(50),
	"custom_byte" character,
	"webpage" varchar(50),
	"name" varchar(50),
	"street" varchar(50),
	"number" varchar(50),
	"zip" varchar(50),
	"town" varchar(50),
	"country" varchar(50),
	"active" boolean DEFAULT false,
	"new_date" timestamptz DEFAULT NOW(),
	"active_date" timestamptz DEFAULT '-infinity',
	"deactive_date" timestamptz DEFAULT '-infinity',
	"logo" bytea,
	"latitude" numeric,
	"longitude" numeric,
	
	CONSTRAINT "customer_config_table_pk" PRIMARY KEY ("customerID")
) WITH (
  OIDS=FALSE
)
TABLESPACE pg_default;

name: Create hypertable
template: echo '\x \\ SELECT create_hypertable('cust_geom');' | psql -U postgres -h localhost -d customer_config

VALUES ( '{{topic}}', '{{payload.col1}}', '{{payload.col2}}', '{{payload.col3}}', '{{payload.col4}}', '{{payload.col5}}', '{{payload.col6}}', '{{payload.col7}}', '{{payload.col8}}','{{payload.col9}}')
ON CONFLICT (company, date) 
DO NOTHING;

name: Embed Grafana dashboard in Dashboard UI
customer_config@localhost
query:
--	"customerID" serial NOT NULL,
--	"cust_geom" geography (POLYGON),
--	"timezone" varchar(50),
--	"description" varchar(50),
--	"custom_byte" character,
--	"webpage" varchar(50),
--	"name" varchar(50),
--	"street" varchar(50),
--	"number" varchar(50),
--	"ZIP" varchar(50),
--	"town" varchar(50),
--	"country" varchar(50),
--	"active" boolean,
--	"new_date" date,
--	"active_date" date,
--	"deactive_date" date,
--	"logo" bytea,
--	"latitude" numeric,
--	"longitude" numeric,
-- msg.topic = table 

INSERT INTO "{{ msg.topic }}"
(
    timezone,
    description, 
    custom_byte, 
    webpage,
    name,
    street,
    number,
    ZIP,
    town,
    country,
    active,
    latitude,
    longitude
)
VALUES
(
    '{{ msg.payload.country}}',
    '{{ msg.payload.description}}',
    '{{ msg.payload.custom_byte}}',
    '{{ msg.payload.webpage}}',
    '{{ msg.payload.name}}',
    '{{ msg.payload.street}}',
    '{{ msg.payload.number}}', 
    '{{ msg.payload.zip}}',
    '{{ msg.payload.town}}',
    '{{ msg.payload.country}}',
    {{ msg.payload.active }},
    {{ msg.payload.latitude}},    
    {{ msg.payload.longitude}}
);

-- SELECT 
--    pg_terminate_backend(pid) 
--FROM 
--    pg_stat_activity 
--WHERE 
    -- don't kill my own connection!
--    pid <> pg_backend_pid();

name: db rows
func:
msg.payload = msg.payload.rows;
return msg;

name: handle tableData
customer_config@localhost
query:
--	"customerID" serial NOT NULL,
--	"cust_geom" geography (POLYGON),
--	"timezone" varchar(50),
--	"description" varchar(50),
--	"custom_byte" character,
--	"webpage" varchar(50),
--	"name" varchar(50),
--	"street" varchar(50),
--	"number" varchar(50),
--	"ZIP" varchar(50),
--	"town" varchar(50),
--	"country" varchar(50),
--	"active" boolean,
--	"new_date" date,
--	"active_date" date,
--	"deactive_date" date,
--	"logo" bytea,
--	"latitude" numeric,
--	"longitude" numeric,
-- msg.topic = table 

SELECT * 
FROM customer_config_table 
WHERE 
    (
    "customerID" = {{msg.customerID}}
    );
--ORDER BY "customerID" ASC ;

name: read data
func:
msg.payload = msg.payload.rows;
return msg;

name: customer_config@localhost
query:
--	"customerID" serial NOT NULL,
--	"cust_geom" geography (POLYGON),
--	"timezone" varchar(50),
--	"description" varchar(50),
--	"custom_byte" character,
--	"webpage" varchar(50),
--	"name" varchar(50),
--	"street" varchar(50),
--	"number" varchar(50),
--	"ZIP" varchar(50),
--	"town" varchar(50),
--	"country" varchar(50),
--	"active" boolean,
--	"new_date" timestamptz,
--	"active_date" timestamptz,
--	"deactive_date" timestamptz,
--	"logo" bytea,
--	"latitude" numeric,
--	"longitude" numeric,


INSERT INTO customer_config_table
(
    timezone,
    description, 
    custom_byte, 
    webpage,
    name,
    street,
    number,
    ZIP,
    town,
    country,
    active,
    new_date,
--    active_date,
--    deactive_date
    latitude,
    longitude
)
VALUES
(
    '{{ msg.payload.country}}',
    '{{ msg.payload.description}}',
    '{{ msg.payload.custom_byte}}',
    '{{ msg.payload.webpage}}',
    '{{ msg.payload.name}}',
    '{{ msg.payload.street}}',
    '{{ msg.payload.number}}', 
    '{{ msg.payload.zip}}',
    '{{ msg.payload.town}}',
    '{{ msg.payload.country}}',
    'false',
    Now(),
--    '{{ msg.payload.active_date }}',
--    '{{ msg.payload.deactive_date }}',
    '{{ msg.payload.latitude}}',    
    '{{ msg.payload.longitude}}'
);

-- dates are filled in when changed in the topic
-- cust_geom is calculated from lats/lomgs of polygon

name: sensor_data@localhost
query:
INSERT INTO sensor_data_table 
(
    ts, 
    sensorid, 
    cap, 
    accel, 
    surftemp,
    inttemp, 
    exttemp, 
    mvbat, 
    mvnoise
) VALUES
(
    '{{msg.timestamp}}', 
    '{{msg.id}}', 
    '{{msg.cap}}', 
    '{{msg.accel}}', 
    '{{msg.surftemp}}', 
    '{{msg.inttemp}}', 
    '{{msg.exttemp}}', 
    '{{msg.mvbat}}',
    '{{msg.mvnoise}}'
);

temp: ts, sensorid, cap, accel, surftemp, inttemp, exttemp, mvbat, mvnoise

func:
msg.cap = msg.payload;
return msg;

msg.accel = msg.payload;
return msg;

name: Serial String
func:
msg.payload = String(msg.timestamp)+','+ String(msg.id)+','+String(msg.cap)+','+String(msg.accel)+','+String(msg.surftemp)+','+String(msg.inttemp)+','+String(msg.exttemp)+','+String(msg.mvbat)+','+ String(msg.mvnoise)+'\n';
return msg;

msg.id = msg.payload;
return msg;

msg.mvbat = msg.payload;

return msg;

msg.mvnoise = msg.payload;
return msg;

msg.topic = msg.payload;
return msg;

name: customer_config@localhost
query:
--	"customerID" serial NOT NULL,
--	"cust_geom" geography (POLYGON),
--	"timezone" varchar(50),
--	"description" varchar(50),
--	"custom_byte" character,
--	"webpage" varchar(50),
--	"name" varchar(50),
--	"street" varchar(50),
--	"number" varchar(50),
--	"ZIP" varchar(50),
--	"town" varchar(50),
--	"country" varchar(50),
--	"active" boolean,
--	"new_date" timestamptz,
--	"active_date" timestamptz,
--	"deactive_date" timestamptz,
--	"logo" bytea,
--	"latitude" numeric,
--	"longitude" numeric,

--UPDATE customer_config_table
--SET webpage = '{{msg.payload.webpage}}'
--WHERE 
--    (
--    "customerID" = {{msg.payload.customerID}}
--    );

UPDATE customer_config_table
SET 
    "timezone" = '{{msg.timezone}}',
    "description" = '{{msg.description}}',
    "custom_byte" = '{{msg.custom_byte}}',
    "webpage" = '{{msg.webpage}}',
    "name" = '{{msg.name}}',
    "street" = '{{msg.street}}',
    "number" = '{{msg.number}}',
    "zip" = '{{msg.zip}}',
    "town" = '{{msg.town}}',
    "country" = '{{msg.country}}',
    "active" = '{{msg.payload.active}}',
--    "new_date" = {{msg.new_date}},
    "active_date" = NOW(),
    "deactive_date" = NOW(),
    "latitude" = {{msg.latitude}},
    "longitude" = {{msg.longitude}}
WHERE 
    (
    "customerID" = {{msg.customerID}}
    );

-- dates are filled in when changed in the topic
-- cust_geom is calculated from lats/lomgs of polygon

query:
--	"customerID" serial NOT NULL,
--	"cust_geom" geography (POLYGON),
--	"timezone" varchar(50),
--	"description" varchar(50),
--	"custom_byte" character,

--	"country" varchar(50),
--	"active" boolean,
--	"new_date" timestamptz,
--	"active_date" timestamptz,
--	"deactive_date" timestamptz,
--	"logo" bytea,
--	"latitude" numeric,
--	"longitude" numeric,

UPDATE customer_config_table
SET 
    "active" = 'true',
    "active_date" = Now(),
    "deactive_date" = '-infinity'
WHERE 
    (
    "customerID" = {{msg.customerID}}
    );

    "active" = 'false',
    "deactive_date" = Now(),
    "active_date" = '-infinity'
WHERE 
    (
    "customerID" = {{msg.customerID}}
    );

name: sensor_config@localhost
query:
DROP TABLE IF EXISTS "{{ msg.topic }}" CASCADE;

CREATE TABLE "{{ msg.topic }}" (
	"ts" timestamptz DEFAULT NOW(),
	"localisation" point,
	"description" varchar(50),
	"customerid" integer,
	"masterid" varchar(50),
	"sensorid" integer,
	"timeslot" integer,
	"vhigh" integer,
	"vlow" integer,
	"meastime" integer NOT NULL,
	"measperiod" integer,
	"rcharge" integer,
	"accel" integer,
	CONSTRAINT "sensor_config_table_pk" PRIMARY KEY ("ts")
) WITH (
  OIDS=FALSE
)
TABLESPACE pg_default;

name: Create hypertable
template: echo '\x \\ SELECT create_hypertable('sensor_geom');' | psql -U postgres -h localhost -d sensor_config

name: extensions
template:
echo '\x \\ DROP DATABASE IF EXISTS {{msg.topic}};' | psql -U postgres -h localhost

echo '\x \\ CREATE DATABASE {{msg.topic}};' | psql -U postgres -h localhost
echo '\x \\ CREATE EXTENSION IF NOT EXISTS timescaledb CASCADE;' | psql -U postgres -h localhost -d sensor_config
echo '\x \\ CREATE EXTENSION IF NOT EXISTS postgis CASCADE;' | psql -U postgres -h localhost -d sensor_config
